text: was researching wine lookup API’s and these guys seem to have a decent one that might work for Sommely prototypes: <http://www.wine-searcher.com/>

attachments.title: Wine-Searcher. Find and Price Wines.
attachments.text: The latest wine news. Wine prices at all online wine stores (search in seconds). Critic scores. Region maps and grape variety encyclopaedia.
attachments.fallback: Wine Searcher: Wine-Searcher. Find and Price Wines.

attachments.text: Wine-Searcher API documentation. Technical description of the Wine-Searcher API.
attachments.fallback: Wine-Searcher API documentation. Technical description of the Wine-Searcher API.

text: feels like we could pull in the details, scores, and price history as well as offer link-outs to more detailed tasting notes: <http://www.wine-searcher.com/wine-99521-2004-arger-martucci-vineyards-dulcinea-california-usa>

text: best part is that it’s free
